subject: Olympic Games
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Plushenko is planning a comeback to defend his Olympic title at the Vancouver Games. Plushenko, a three-time world champion, dominated skating from 2003-6. He is back training with his longtime coach, Alexei Mishin, and has mastered two quadruple jumps, according to his agent. Plushenko, 26, has not competed since winning the Turin Games in 2006. evgeni.
